colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI JANG JUNG CHEN PO WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS, ,BA ZO DANG GSO BA SOGS RIG PA'I YON TAN DANG THOS BSAM BSGOM PA TSUL KHRIMS RNAMS KYI RGYAN GYIS MDZES PAR LDAN, ,THUNG KA LAG PI LIG THU SLOB DPON BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN ZHES BGYIS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I, ,SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA DEG BA YOD NA DE YIS GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI DON GRUB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: LO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
